RefParameter.Name: ActiveW
RefParameter.Description: When the graphics is enabled this register value will be devided by zone value(the parameter zone is in graphics parameters settings).

RefParameter.Name: HorizontalSync
RefParameter.Description: This register value is equal to (Horizontal Synchronization Width - 1)

RefParameter.Name: AccumulatedHBP
RefParameter.Description: This register value is equal to the (Horizontal Synchronization Width + Horizontal Back Porch - 1)

RefParameter.Name: AccumulatedActiveW
RefParameter.Description: This register value is equal to (Horizontal Synchronization Width + Horizontal Back Porch + Active Width - 1)

RefParameter.Name: TotalWidth
RefParameter.Description: This register value is equal to (Horizontal Synchronization Width + Horizontal Back Porch + Active Width + Horizontal Front Porch - 1)

RefParameter.Name: VerticalSync
RefParameter.Description: This register value is equal to (Vertical Synchronization Height - 1)

RefParameter.Name: AccumulatedVBP
RefParameter.Description: This register value is equal to the (Vertical Synchronization Height + Vertical Back Porch - 1)

RefParameter.Name: AccumulatedActiveH
RefParameter.Description: This register value is equal to the (Vertical Synchronization Height + Vertical Back Porch + Active Height - 1)

RefParameter.Name: TotalHeigh
RefParameter.Description: This register value is equal to the (Vertical Synchronization Height + Vertical Back Porch + Active Height + Vertical Front Porch - 1)

RefParameter.Name: Layers
RefParameter.Description: Select the number of layers to configure (max of 2)

RefParameter.Name: WindowX0_L0
RefParameter.Description: Configures the Window Horizontal Start Position Window X0.

RefParameter.Name: WindowX1_L0
RefParameter.Description:
Configures the Window Horizontal Stop Position Window X1.
< For information :
When the graphics is enabled the Window Horizontal Stop value will be devided by zone value(the parameter zone is in graphics parameters settings).

RefParameter.Name: WindowY0_L0
RefParameter.Description: Configures the Window vertical Start Position Window Y0.

RefParameter.Name: WindowY1_L0
RefParameter.Description: Configures the Window vertical Stop Position Window Y1.
